titles.title: Raising a question of the privilege of the House pursuant to Article I, Section 7, of the U.S. Constitution.

action.text: Mr. Goss moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Agreed to by recorded vote: 213 - 212 (Roll no. 446).

bill.summary: 7/27/2000--Introduced. States that the conference report accompanying H.R. 4516 (FY 2001 legislative appropriations) contravenes article I, section 7 of the Constitution, is an infringement of the privileges of the House of Representatives, and should be recommitted to the committee of conference.
